definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cut, (cut off, sever), √ of [[גׇּוִית]] (cf. Talm. [[גְּזׇא]] cut off); hence perh.

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. act.sf. [[גּוֹוִי]] Ps 71:6 thou art he that severed me from my mother's womb (De Che; LXX skepasth/v, De prop. Ekspasth/v, v. LXX Ps 22:10; Vulgate protector cf. LXX, Thes Ew Hup Pe benefactor, cf. Ar. gnjw0ra jaza0 requite, Jerus. Syr. jaza0, Talm. [[גְּזָא]] id.);—txt. and mng. dub.; ‖ Ps 22:10 has [[גּׁחִי]]; v. Che:crit. n. and OP 476; Du [[עֻזִּי]].
